title: Deprecate tk board command
description:
Deprecate tk board in favor of tk run --board/--cloud.

## Phase 1: Deprecation Warning

In board.go:
```go
func runBoard(cmd *cobra.Command, args []string) error {
    // Show deprecation warning
    if !boardQuiet {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, 
            styles.Yellow("Warning: 'tk board' is deprecated."))
        
        if boardCloud {
            fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, 
                styles.Dim("  Use instead: tk run --cloud"))
        } else {
            fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, 
                styles.Dim("  Use instead: tk run --board"))
        }
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr)
    }
    
    // Continue with existing implementation for now
    return runBoardImpl(cmd, args)
}
```

Add --quiet flag to suppress warning (for scripts):
```go
var boardQuiet bool
boardCmd.Flags().BoolVarP(&boardQuiet, "quiet", "q", false, "suppress warnings")
```

## Phase 2: Update Documentation

- Update README.md command reference
- Update help text in run.go
- Add migration notes

## Phase 3: Remove (Later Release)

In a future version (e.g., v1.0):
- Remove board.go entirely
- Remove from command registration
- Update all references

## Timeline

- v0.6.0: Add deprecation warning
- v0.7.0: Warn more prominently
- v1.0.0: Remove tk board command
closed_reason: Added --quiet/-q flag to suppress deprecation warning. Warning already present from task o0c, now conditional on !boardQuiet. Future: v0.7 more prominent warning, v1.0 remove command.
